WorkItem.ClosedComment: User reported all is well.  But yah, what Astrylian said.  Trying to load anything from the Armory on a Tuesday morning is a Bad Idea (tm). :)
WorkItem.Description:
I appreciate this is mentioned under Troubleshooting but I thought I'd just post to say that the following items prevent (my?) character from being loaded into rawr from the armory
Item 25549 - Blood Knight's Tabard
Item 24143 - Initiate's Shirt
Removing these items from the toon allows the Load from Armory to take place correctly.
This has worked correctly until 2.3.13
I also receive the same error if I attempt to load a saved copy of the character containing these items. I've no idea if it makes a difference but I'm updating item cache from armory now just in case.
 
Actual error(s) as posted:
Step Name: Get Item
Description: No item returned from Armory for 25549
 
Step Name: Get Character
Description: Rawr encountered an error retrieving the Character - Jerec@EU-Aszune from the armory.
Add'l Info: Generating a Rawr Character
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Rawr.Character.RecalculateSetBonuses()
   at Rawr.Character..ctor(String name, String realm, CharacterRegion region, CharacterRace race, BossHandler boss, String head, String neck, String shoulders, String back, String chest, String shirt, String tabard, String wrist, String hands, String waist, String legs, String feet, String finger1, String finger2, String trinket1, String trinket2, String mainHand, String offHand, String ranged, String projectile, String projectileBag)
   at Rawr.Armory.GetCharacter(CharacterRegion region, String realm, String name, String[]& itemsOnCharacter)
 
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Shirt and Tabard Prevent Character Load in 2.3.13

Comments.Message: Just like to report that my druid loaded up without issue while wearing the Argent Crusade Tabard.   My hunter on the other hand is wearing a shirt of some kind and will not load the old character file.

Update For information: The 'Update item cache from the Armory' has now completed and the character will correctly load with the items listed above which were failing before.

All working as expected at this time.
Most likely, this is due to the Armory being down this morning, and you not having the data for those items.
